meanings.definition: Occurring or existing after an impact.
meanings.sent1: The postimpact analysis showed the damage caused by the collision.
meanings.sent2: The repair work was done postimpact to ensure safety.
meanings.sent3: The postimpact investigation revealed the sequence of events leading to the crash.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor was like a postimpact shield against the chaos.
meanings.sent5: The postimpact scene was a stark reminder of the force of the collision.

meanings.sent1: The postimpact effects were visible on the structure.
meanings.sent2: The postimpact assessment highlighted the areas needing attention.
meanings.sent3: The postimpact changes in the landscape were unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The postimpact silence was eerie after the loud crash.
meanings.sent5: The postimpact period required careful monitoring for any further damage.
